doc.title: Embracing Passion
doc.plot: EMBRACING PASSION Millions of Americans are at a crossroads. We're faced with doing more of the same but wanting a different outcome. We want to be happier, healthier, and more at peace with ourselves. We want joy and love. But now for the hard part. Are these desires and wishes compatible with our actions and choices? This program explores how to make positive changes so that we can achieve more of what we want out of life. Do you have awareness, but no passion? Do you spend more time seeking happiness or avoiding suffering? Do you allow the narrow views and limitations of others to become yours? Do you work at controlling or creating external activities with the hope that they will be successful?
